S01kbavk64u:4: mahatāṃ maṇivimalānāṃ api bhavati na rāgasaṃkrāntiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:5: KAvk_64.2 śākyālaye darśanam eva pitrā sarvānukampī bhṛśam arthyamānaḥ
S01kbavk64u:7: KAvk_64.3 tadā tadā harmyagatā mṛgākṣī karṇāvataṃsīkṛtanetrakāntiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:8: kāntyā diśāṃ vismayam ullikhantaṃ yaśodharā taṃ dayitaṃ vilokya //
S01kbavk64u:10: dhṛtiṃ vayasyām iva vārayantīṃ nirasya saudhāt tanum utsasarja //
S01kbavk64u:11: KAvk_64.5 yadā yadā pallavapeśalāṅgī dehaṃ samutsṛṣṭavatī satī sā /
S01kbavk64u:12: tadā tadā manmathamohitāṃ tāṃ dayārdracakṣur bhagavān rarakṣa //
S01kbavk64u:13: KAvk_64.6 tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān vanānte tatkautukād bhikṣugaṇena pṛṣṭaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:15: KAvk_64.7 yaśodharā madviraheṇa nityaṃ karoti yat sāhasam etad ārtā /
S01kbavk64u:16: haranti dhairyaṃ vitaranti mohaṃ eṣa svabhāvaḥ smaravibhramāṇāṃ //
S01kbavk64u:17: KAvk_64.8 mayāpi tasyā viraheṇa pūrvaṃ janmāntare māravimohitena /
S01kbavk64u:21: KAvk_64.10 bhujenāliṅgitā bhūmiḥ kṛtā kaṇṭhe sarasvatī /
S01kbavk64u:22: lakṣmīḥ prasādhitā yena kīrtir eva pravāsitā //
S01kbavk64u:23: KAvk_64.11 rāmāyāṃ tasya jāyāyāṃ tanayaḥ sudhanābhidhaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:27: KAvk_64.13 babhūva tasya bhūbhartur bhūpatir bhūmyanantaraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:37: KAvk_64.18 rājñā doṣākareṇeyaṃ jaḍena janatā param /
S01kbavk64u:41: KAvk_64.20 kaṣṭā tatrāpy anāvṛṣṭiḥ pāpaśāpena bhūpateḥ /
S01kbavk64u:47: KAvk_64.22 dhanaḥ śrimān kṣitipatiḥ śrūyate rāṣṭravardhanaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:49: KAvk_64.23 apatyam iva rāṣṭraṃ yaḥ sadā paśyati bhūpatiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:51: KAvk_64.24 iti niścayam ādhāya yayus te hastināpuraṃ /
S01kbavk64u:52: tyājyaḥ kāyo 'pi sāpāyaḥ kiṃ punar deśasaṃśrayaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:53: KAvk_64.25 jñātvā mahendraseno 'pi svapuraṃ nirjanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:55: KAvk_64.26 dhanasya dhanino rājñaḥ puraṃ matpuravāsinaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:56: prayātā iti naś cāraiḥ kathitaṃ gūḍhacāribhiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:57: KAvk_64.27 durbhikṣakhinnā yadi te yātā mama ripoḥ puram /
S01kbavk64u:58: tat sarvatra bhavanty eva paryāyair devaviplavāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:59: KAvk_64.28 atha vā rājadoṣena gatās te sukhavāñchayā /
S01kbavk64u:62: dūrastha eva sarvasya sarvo bhavati vallabhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:63: KAvk_64.30 asmadabhyadhikaḥ ko 'sau tasya bhūmipater guṇaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:64: pareṣāṃ harate yena mugdhā jāyā iva prajāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:65: KAvk_64.31 upāyaś cintyatāṃ tāvat tasya darpapraśāntaye /
S01kbavk64u:67: KAvk_64.32 iti rājavacaḥ śrutvā mahāmātyā babhāṣire /
S01kbavk64u:69: KAvk_64.33 viṣaye nāgarājo 'sti citro nāma bahūdakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:73: KAvk_64.35 tasmād vidyābalān nāgaḥ sa hartuṃ yadi śakyate /
S01kbavk64u:74: tadā yānti svayaṃ tasya prajās tvām eva saṃśrayam //
S01kbavk64u:75: KAvk_64.36 dīptamantrabalaṃ kaṃ cit tasmād anviṣya sādhakam /
S01kbavk64u:77: KAvk_64.37 ity amātyavacaḥ śrutvā tathety āha mahīpatiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:81: KAvk_64.39 sa tair vidyādharo nāma suvarṇārpaṇasaṃvidā /
S01kbavk64u:84: bhavanaṃ bhogināṃ bhartuḥ sa dadarśa nabhaḥprabham //
S01kbavk64u:91: KAvk_64.44 athādṛśyaḥ samutthāya taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantrasādhakam /
S01kbavk64u:95: KAvk_64.46 vane saṃprati digbandhaḥ kṛto 'nena durātmanā /
S01kbavk64u:96: badhnāty eṣa na yāvan māṃ tāvad yuktikramaḥ kṣamaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:97: KAvk_64.47 tīropānte vasaty asmin maharṣir valkalāyanaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:98: jāne so 'pi na me sādhu paritrāṇe pragalbhate //
S01kbavk64u:100: lubdhakaḥ padmako nāma sa me saṃrakṣaṇakṣamaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:101: KAvk_64.49 iti niścitya manasā sa gatvā lubdhakāntikam /
S01kbavk64u:104: dhanvī taṃ deśam abhyetya mantradhīraṃ vyalokayat //
S01kbavk64u:113: rakṣārthanām iva cakāra taraṅgahastasaktāñjali prabalakampavilolam ambhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:114: KAvk_64.54 ātte vidyābalāt tena nāge garudatejasā /
S01kbavk64u:120: KAvk_64.57 sā vidyābandhakī tasya lobhād anyopayoginī /
S01kbavk64u:127: abhyarcyamānaś citreṇa kaṃ cit kālam uvāsa saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:128: KAvk_64.61 kadā cid atha nāgena pūjyamānaṃ savismayaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:130: KAvk_64.62 taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatprabhāvaṃ ca śrutvā nāganiveditam /
S01kbavk64u:132: KAvk_64.63 ajayyaṃ samarodyoge surāṇām api bandhanaṃ /
S01kbavk64u:133: taṃ jīvitādhikaṃ tasmai dadau prītyā phaṇīśvaraḥ //
S01kbavk64u:134: KAvk_64.64 tatas taṃ pāśam ādāya citram āmantrya lubdhakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:136: KAvk_64.65 nāgaprabhāvasaṃprāptāṃ ciraṃ bhuktvā sa saṃpadam /
S01kbavk64u:138: KAvk_64.66 pālayan pitur ācāraṃ so 'pi lubdhakumārakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:140: KAvk_64.67 tataḥ kadā cit sa muner viśrāntasya sthitaḥ puraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:143: KAvk_64.68 tataḥ kadā cit sa muner viśrāntasya sthitaḥ puraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:148: KAvk_64.69 citranyastam ivālokya so 'pṛcchad vismito munim //
S01kbavk64u:151: KAvk_64.70 iti lubdhakaputreṇa pṛṣṭas taṃ munir abravīt /
S01kbavk64u:153: KAvk_64.71 drumasya kinnarapateḥ kanyā kanyāśatair vṛtā /
S01kbavk64u:155: KAvk_64.72 śrutvaitat kautukākrāntaḥ sa punar munim abhyadhāt /
S01kbavk64u:157: KAvk_64.73 tam uvāca munir yasya bhavet pāśaḥ karāgragaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:159: KAvk_64.74 etad ākarṇya sotsāhas taṃ praṇamyātha lubdhakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:163: KAvk_64.76 madbye snānotthitāṃ tāsāṃ sa dadarśa manoharām /
S01kbavk64u:179: cakre pāśam amoghākhyaṃ sajjaṃ sapadi lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:181: kinnaryo divam utpetuḥ pāśahastaṃ vilokya taṃ //
S01kbavk64u:183: manoharāṃ sa jagrāha hariṇīm iva lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:184: KAvk_64.85 sā pāśavivaśā tena kṛṣṭā kaṣṭadaśāṃ śritā /
S01kbavk64u:187: nirīkṣamāṇā kakubhaḥ sā saṃbhrāntā tam abhyadhāt //
S01kbavk64u:188: KAvk_64.87 muñca muñca dṛḍhākṣiptāṃ mā sprākṣīḥ parirakṣa mām /
S01kbavk64u:189: krūrā api bhavanty eva śokārtiṣu kṛpālavaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:191: sadyaḥ pradīptā vidyeva nirdahaty eva sādhakam //
S01kbavk64u:192: KAvk_64.89 māṃ vicārya dhiyā dhīmann ucitāya prayacchataḥ /
S01kbavk64u:194: KAvk_64.90 pīḍāṃ pāśakṛtām etāṃ na sahe muñca bandhanam /
S01kbavk64u:195: svayaṃ vrajāmy ahaṃ tatra yatra te 'bhimatā gatiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:196: KAvk_64.91 divam utplutya gacchāmi na tv ahaṃ muktabandhanā /
S01kbavk64u:197: yadvaśān me gatir vyomni cūḍāratnaṃ gṛhāṇa tat //
S01kbavk64u:198: KAvk_64.92 ity uktaḥ sa tayā sāsraṃ prayātaḥ karuṇārdratām /
S01kbavk64u:199: cūḍāmaṇiṃ samādāya pāśaṃ muktvā jagāda tām //
S01kbavk64u:200: KAvk_64.93 samāśvasihi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum arhasi /
S01kbavk64u:206: KAvk_64.96 sa te samucitaḥ subhru vibhramābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:209: KAvk_64.97 sa te samucitaḥ subhru vibhramābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:216: prasthitaḥ sudhano dhanvī śanais taṃ deśam āyayau //
S01kbavk64u:222: harann iva rajaḥpuñjaṃ vyājahāra sa sārathim //
S01kbavk64u:234: paśyanti dantiśiśavaḥ parito rathaṃ me nemisvanāpaḥrtacāpalalīnakarṇāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:239: KAvk_64.110 iti bruvāṇaḥ kalayan vanalakṣmīṃ nṛpātmajaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:240: śuśrāva nirjane kīrṇaṃ kinnaryāḥ karuṇaṃ svanam //
S01kbavk64u:245: KAvk_64.113 anveṣṭuṃ lubdhakākṛṣṭaṃ svam aṅkaṃrgam āgatām /
S01kbavk64u:251: KAvk_64.116 durlabhā bhogibhavane martyaloke kathaiva kā /
S01kbavk64u:256: sāṃrājye jagatāṃ yayā vijayate devo vilāsāyudhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:258: tāṃ pibantam ivābhyetya praṇamya prāha lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:262: tvam evāsyā guṇodāra bhartā bhuva ivocitaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:263: KAvk_64.121 asyāś cūḍāmaṇir ayaṃ mayā svecchāgatipradaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:265: KAvk_64.122 rakṣyo maṇir ayaṃ nāsti datte 'smin saṃgamo 'nayā /
S01kbavk64u:266: ity uktvāsmai dadau kanyāratnaṃ ratnaṃ ca lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:271: KAvk_64.125 kinnarīṃ ratham āropya ratnair āpūrya lubdhakam /
S01kbavk64u:273: KAvk_64.126 sa hastināpuraṃ prāpya nivedya svakathāṃ pituḥ /
S01kbavk64u:275: KAvk_64.127 sukṛtair bhogyatāṃ yātāṃ mūrtām iva śaśiśriyam /
S01kbavk64u:279: KAvk_64.129 maune 'pi kathitotkaṇṭhāṃ muhuḥ kampe 'pi niścalām /
S01kbavk64u:280: vailakṣye 'pi sphuṭallakṣmīṃ tasyāḥ prītiṃ tatāna saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:281: KAvk_64.130 sa śanair adharāsvāde dattvā dantavibhīṣikām /
S01kbavk64u:283: KAvk_64.131 nīvīmokṣe niṣedhe ca dampatyoḥ paṇipadmayoḥ /
S01kbavk64u:302: sadā saṃsadi mām eva nayaty eṣa vilakṣatām //
S01kbavk64u:303: KAvk_64.140 prajñā vañcakavṛttāya śrutaṃ darpajvarāya ca /
S01kbavk64u:305: KAvk_64.141 dṛptaḥ paribhavaty eṣa rājaputrāśrayeṇa mām /
S01kbavk64u:306: tasmād āśrayam evāsya śrīmūlam praharāmy aham //
S01kbavk64u:307: KAvk_64.142 nidhane rājaputrasya yuktyupāyena kena cit /
S01kbavk64u:308: yuktaḥ kartuṃ prayatno me mānamlāniṃ kathaṃ sahe //
S01kbavk64u:309: KAvk_64.143 ity ugrapāpasaṃkalpas tasya dveṣāt samudyayau /
S01kbavk64u:310: nāsti tat pātakaṃ loke yan na kurvanti matsarāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:311: KAvk_64.144 kathaṃ paśyati sadvartma sa sadā vyathitāśayaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:313: rāgaḥ pāpaṃ paramam adhikaṃ darpapāpaṃ tato 'pi
S01kbavk64u:314: krodhāt pāpaṃ jagati na paraṃ duḥsahaṃ lobhapāpam /
S01kbavk64u:315: yāvān eṣa vyasanini jane gaṇyate pāpavargaḥ
S01kbavk64u:316: pāpāṃśasya spṛśati na tulāṃ so 'pi vidveṣasūteḥ //
S01kbavk64u:317: KAvk_64.146 tataḥ kadā cin meghākhyaṃ krūraṃ karvaṭavāsinam /
S01kbavk64u:321: KAvk_64.148 kumāra gamyatāṃ tūrṇam ucchettuṃ tarasā ripum /
S01kbavk64u:322: kramopapannaṃ sāṃrājyaṃ niḥśalyam idam astu te //
S01kbavk64u:323: KAvk_64.149 ayaṃ te samarārambhe prabhāvābharaṇo bhujaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:327: KAvk_64.151 durbalaiḥ kiṃ hatair anyaiḥ sāmantair antavāsibhiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:328: dṛptaḥ sa eva hantavyas tadvadhe sarvasiddhayaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:336: jananīṃ svairam abhyetya praṇipatya jagāda saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:339: KAvk_64.156 asyāś cūḍāmaṇir ayaṃ rakṣyaḥ svecchāgatipradaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:341: KAvk_64.157 ity uktvā jananīhaste kāntaṃ kāntāśikhāmaṇim /
S01kbavk64u:345: KAvk_64.159 dūraṃ prayāte dayite viraheṇa manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:351: dveṣaḥ puṣpaśare sukhe vimukhatā dehe 'pi niḥsnehatā
S01kbavk64u:353: śayyā bhūmitalaṃ tathāpi sutanos tāpakṣatir nābhavan
S01kbavk64u:357: KAvk_64.163 kadā cid atha bhūpālaḥ svapnadarśanaśaṅkitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:359: KAvk_64.164 dṛṣṭaṃ adya mayā svapne niruddhaṃ śatrubhiḥ puram /
S01kbavk64u:361: KAvk_64.165 svapnasyāsya vipākārhaṃ phalaṃ brūhi mahāmate /
S01kbavk64u:363: KAvk_64.166 iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena kṣaṇam antaḥ purohitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:365: KAvk_64.167 upāyo 'yaṃ mayā diṣṭyā prāptaḥ suciracintitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:367: KAvk_64.168 priyā manoharā jyeṣṭhaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya kinnarī /
S01kbavk64u:368: abhāve niyataṃ tasyā na sa jīvati duḥkhitaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:371: KAvk_64.170 duḥsvapno 'yaṃ tvayā deva hṛdayākampanaḥ param /
S01kbavk64u:372: dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya duḥsahaṃ katham ucyate //
S01kbavk64u:375: KAvk_64.172 rājyāt bhraṃśaḥ śarīrād vā svapnasyāsya phalaṃ sphuṭam /
S01kbavk64u:379: KAvk_64.174 kinnarīmedasā vahniṃ hutvā kuśalam āpsyasi /
S01kbavk64u:380: antaḥpure snuṣā te 'sti kinnarī na tu durlabhā //
S01kbavk64u:381: KAvk_64.175 iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā krūraṃ pātakakūṇitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:384: kinnarīvirahe 'vaśyaṃ na ca jīvati me sutaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:385: KAvk_64.177 iti bhūmibhujā tasya pratyākhyāte samīhite /
S01kbavk64u:387: KAvk_64.178 aho rājan na jānīṣe dhīmān api janasthitim /
S01kbavk64u:388: trivargasādhanaṃ tyājyam na rājyaṃ na ca jīvitaṃ //
S01kbavk64u:389: KAvk_64.179 arthā iva svajanamitrakalatraputrā naṣṭāḥ sthitasya puruṣasya punar bhavanti /
S01kbavk64u:390: ucchvāsamātravirahe gatajīvitasya tatkālasaṃnihitam apy asad eva sarvam //
S01kbavk64u:392: jīvitād aparaṃ rājañ jīvaloke 'sti na priyam //
S01kbavk64u:393: KAvk_64.181 iti jīvitalobhāya tena nānānidarśanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:397: KAvk_64.183 rājñā kathitavṛttāntā nijapatnī svayaṃ rahaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:399: KAvk_64.184 aho mūrkhataro rājā mohāndhena purodhasā /
S01kbavk64u:403: KAvk_64.186 yadi jīvitalubdhena mugdhā mṛgavadhūr iva /
S01kbavk64u:404: snuṣāpi hanyate rājñā tat kiṃ vakṣyāmy ahaṃ sutam //
S01kbavk64u:405: KAvk_64.187 mātas tvayeyaṃ vātsalyāt pālyā mama manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:406: ity uktvā sudhanaḥ sūnur gato nikṣipya me vadhūm //
S01kbavk64u:407: KAvk_64.188 tasmāc cūḍāmaṇim mattaḥ prāpya vyomnā prayātu sā /
S01kbavk64u:408: bhaviṣyati tayā patyur jīvantyā saṃgamaḥ punaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:409: KAvk_64.189 iti saṃcintya sā gatvā sāśrunetrā snuṣāntikam /
S01kbavk64u:411: KAvk_64.190 vatse cūḍāmaṇiṃ baddhvā gaccha tūrṇaṃ vihāyasā /
S01kbavk64u:413: KAvk_64.191 yajñabhūmiṃ tvayā gatvā gantavyaṃ vyomavartmanā /
S01kbavk64u:414: anyathā tvām asau vetti gūḍhanyastāṃ mayā kva cit //
S01kbavk64u:415: KAvk_64.192 iti bhartṛpravāsārtā vacaḥ śrutvā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:417: KAvk_64.193 śvaśrvā dattaṃ samādāya baddhvā mūrdhni śikhāmaṇim /
S01kbavk64u:419: rājan naitat tava samucitaṃ yat priyasyāpi sūnor
S01kbavk64u:420: vadhyā patnī nijapadam iyaṃ svasti tubhyaṃ gatāham /
S01kbavk64u:423: KAvk_64.195 tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ nṛpatir yajñavighnena śaṅkitaḥ
S01kbavk64u:424: purohitas tam avadad deva mā saṃśayaṃ kṛthāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:425: KAvk_64.196 mantrair mayā samākṛṣṭaḥ krūrākhyo brahmarākṣasaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:426: nirvighnas te kratuḥ siddhaḥ sā hatā tena kinnarī //
S01kbavk64u:427: KAvk_64.197 iti mithyāvacas tasya rājā satyam amanyata /
S01kbavk64u:429: KAvk_64.198 pitur bhavanam abhyetya kīrṇaharṣā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:433: KAvk_64.200 martyāmodaḥ pratanutāṃ kṣālitāyāḥ śanair yayau /
S01kbavk64u:435: KAvk_64.201 divyodyānopabhogeṣu na sā nirvṛtim āyayau /
S01kbavk64u:437: KAvk_64.202 sā kāntavirahaklāntā kadā cid vyomagāminī /
S01kbavk64u:442: tvam eva brūhi bhagavan yadi yuktam idaṃ kṛtam //
S01kbavk64u:443: KAvk_64.205 iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā kiṃcillajjānatānanaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:444: tām uvāca munir mugdhe tavaiṣā bhavitavyatā //
S01kbavk64u:445: KAvk_64.206 amoghapāśas tasyāstīty ajñātvā kathitaṃ mayā /
S01kbavk64u:446: upalabhya kathāṃ dhūrtas tvāṃ babandha sa lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:447: KAvk_64.207 duṣṭātmanāṃ na jānīmaḥ kauṭilyaṃ krūracetasām /
S01kbavk64u:449: KAvk_64.208 ity uktā muninā tanvī praṇayāt tam abhāṣata /
S01kbavk64u:451: KAvk_64.209 idaṃ tu bhavatām agre yan mayā kiṃ cid ucyate /
S01kbavk64u:453: KAvk_64.210 kathātithitvam āyānti cāpale guravo 'pi yat /
S01kbavk64u:461: KAvk_64.214 tad idaṃ bhavatā vācyaṃ kāruṇyād vacasā mama /
S01kbavk64u:463: KAvk_64.215 utkaṇṭhām anukampāṃ vā sahajāṃ vā kṛtajñatām /
S01kbavk64u:464: dākṣiṇyaṃ vā puraskṛtya tūrṇam āgamyatām itaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:467: KAvk_64.217 dīptā tapovanānte 'smin sudhā nāma mahauṣadhiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:468: dṛśyate haviṣā paktvā pātavyā sā svayaṃ tvayā //
S01kbavk64u:471: KAvk_64.219 idaṃ ca tasmai dātavyam madabhijñāṅgulīyakam /
S01kbavk64u:472: ity uktvā viṣamaṃ vartma kathayitvā krameṇa sā //
S01kbavk64u:477: KAvk_64.222 atrāntare rājasūnur jitvā meghaṃ mahīpatim /
S01kbavk64u:487: pitur antaḥpuraṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vipriyam aśaṅkata //
S01kbavk64u:488: KAvk_64.226 api jīvati sā tanvī virahārtā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:489: iti bruvāṇaṃ na yadā tam ūce kaś cid apriyam //
S01kbavk64u:490: KAvk_64.227 tadā jagāda jananī putra jīvati te priyā /
S01kbavk64u:491: gatā cūḍāmaṇiṃ prāpya kiṃ tu jīvitasaṃśaye //
S01kbavk64u:492: KAvk_64.228 iti śrutvaiva sahasā sa papāta mahītale /
S01kbavk64u:495: KAvk_64.229 iti śrutvaiva sahasā sa papāta mahītale /
S01kbavk64u:502: vihitā na dhṛtir mayā mṛgākṣyās tad ayaṃ me patitaḥ smarābhiśāpaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:503: KAvk_64.232 dehi prativacaḥ subhru kva gatāsi manohare /
S01kbavk64u:509: KAvk_64.235 vañcayitvā parijanaṃ sa rajanyām alakṣitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:510: gatvā vanāntaṃ babhrāma sameṣu viṣameṣu ca //
S01kbavk64u:515: brūhi sakhe śukaśāvaka sakhyuḥ prāṇasakhīṃ nikhilendumukhīṃ tām /
S01kbavk64u:521: KAvk_64.239 tasyeti tīvravyasanānubandhāt pralāpinaḥ praskhalataḥ same 'pi /
S01kbavk64u:522: diśan prakāśaṃ dayayeva mārge śanair jagāhe gaganaṃ sitāṃśuḥ //
S01kbavk64u:523: KAvk_64.240 śyāmāpater manmathabāndhavasya kāntaṃ sa dṛṣṭvāmbaracumbi bimbam /
S01kbavk64u:524: saṃdarśitaṃ sasmitam indumukhyā mene mukhaṃ vyomavimānaśrṅgāt //
S01kbavk64u:525: KAvk_64.241 mūkaṃ kalaṅkāṅkam avāptadoṣam avibhramaṃ hāsavilāsahīnaṃ /
S01kbavk64u:526: cireṇa niścitya śaśāṅkam eva papraccha gacchan naranāthasūnuḥ //
S01kbavk64u:527: KAvk_64.242 api tvayā kāntisakhī sakhe khe tulyekṣaṇā lakṣmaṃrgasya dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:529: KAvk_64.243 api tvayā kāntisakhī sakhe khe tulyekṣaṇā lakṣmaṃrgasya dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:531: kathaṃ na kiṃ cit kathayaty ayaṃ me gatasya kāntākathanārthibhāvam /
S01kbavk64u:533: KAvk_64.244 api tvayā snigdhataḍitprakāśā ghanastanī kvāpi mayūra dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:534: tvadbarhabhārasya suhṛt sa yasyā vicitramālyaḥ kabarīkalāpaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:535: KAvk_64.245 bhujaṃga kac cid bhavatā bhujaṃgī dṛṣṭā kva cit sā vararatnacūḍā /
S01kbavk64u:536: viṣacchaṭāḥ paśya yayā visṛṣṭā māṃ duḥsahe 'smin virahe dahanti //
S01kbavk64u:537: KAvk_64.246 sāraṅga sā raṅgavilāsinī kiṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā manmathapārthivasya /
S01kbavk64u:538: yasyāḥ kaṭākṣotpalasaṃvibhāgair vibhānti manye gahane hariṇyaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:539: KAvk_64.247 api tvayā vibhramajanmabhumir vanaspate pallavapeśaloṣṭhī /
S01kbavk64u:540: līlāvilolā lalanā vanānte lateva dṛṣṭā stabakāvanaṃrā //
S01kbavk64u:541: KAvk_64.248 anena nūnaṃ vanakuñjareṇa sā rājarambhā parirambhalobhāt /
S01kbavk64u:542: ākṛṣya nītā ghanasaṃnibhena saṃcchāditā vā śaśinaḥ kaleva //
S01kbavk64u:548: api śamitaśaśāṅkoddāmasaundaryadarpā munivara hariṇākṣī kinnarī kāpi dṛṣṭā //
S01kbavk64u:550: muniḥ śrutvā vacas tasya parijñāya tam abravīt //
S01kbavk64u:551: KAvk_64.253 samāśvasihi viśramya saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam /
S01kbavk64u:552: dṛṣṭā sā tava kalyāṇī mayā mānasacandrikā //
S01kbavk64u:558: tasyā naiva kva cid api manaḥ kiṃ tu viśrāntim eti //
S01kbavk64u:559: KAvk_64.256 drumasya kinnarapateḥ sthitāhaṃ bhavane pituḥ /
S01kbavk64u:560: āgantavyaṃ tvayā tūrṇam iti tvāṃ saṃdideśa sā //
S01kbavk64u:562: agamye kinnarapure kramād vartma śaśaṃsa ca //
S01kbavk64u:563: KAvk_64.258 idaṃ ca tvatkṛte dattaṃ tayā ratnāṅgulīyakam /
S01kbavk64u:566: aṅgulīyaṃ dadau tasmai mārgaṃ cākathayan muniḥ //
S01kbavk64u:569: KAvk_64.26 sa siddhāṃ ghṛtapākena sudhāṃ pītvā mahauṣadhim /
S01kbavk64u:571: KAvk_64.262 ṛddhyā saṃnihitaṃ tasya sarvopakaraṇaṃ pathi /
S01kbavk64u:576: vāyuvegākhyam āruhya sa taṃ śailam alaṅghayat //
S01kbavk64u:583: KAvk_64.268 athogrataram āruhya vajrakākhyaṃ sa parvatam /
S01kbavk64u:587: KAvk_64.270 māṃsalubdhā tam utkṣipya gṛdhrarūpā niśācarī /
S01kbavk64u:589: KAvk_64.271 mṛgacarma samutsṛjya tāṃ nihatya sa vīryavān /
S01kbavk64u:591: KAvk_64.272 mṛgacarma samutsṛjya tāṃ nihatya sa vīryavān /
S01kbavk64u:593: praviśya tadguhāṃ lebhe śilāṃ vyasya mahauṣadhim /
S01kbavk64u:595: KAvk_64.273 sa yantraparvatau prāpya saṃghaṭtaiḥ prāṇahāriṇau /
S01kbavk64u:599: KAvk_64.275 tīvraprahārau puruṣau yantrameṣau ca duḥsahau /
S01kbavk64u:604: rodinīṃ ca nadīṃ tīre yasyāḥ kinnaraceṭikāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:607: KAvk_64.279 diśanti puline yasyā vyasanaṃ kinnarāṅganāḥ /
S01kbavk64u:608: laṅghayitvāpagāś cānyā vetrāṃ prāpya nadīṃ tataḥ //
S01kbavk64u:611: KAvk_64.281 tayā prāpya paraṃ pāram āśayevātidīrghayā /
S01kbavk64u:613: KAvk_64.282 praviśya sa śanaiḥ prapya kāntāṃ kanakapadminīm /
S01kbavk64u:617: KAvk_64.284 kumbhotkṣepe śramārtāyās tatraikasyāḥ sametya saḥ /
S01kbavk64u:618: hastālambena sāhāyyaṃ kṛtvā papraccha tārn śanaiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:619: KAvk_64.285 mātaḥ kasya kṛte toyaṃ idaṃ yatnena nīyate /
S01kbavk64u:621: KAvk_64.286 iti tena priyagirā sā pṛṣṭā tam abhāṣata /
S01kbavk64u:625: KAvk_64.288 tayeti kathitaṃ śrutvā sudhāsikta iva kṣaṇāt /
S01kbavk64u:627: KAvk_64.289 snāntyās tatas tad abhihāri manoharāyāḥ kumbhāt papāta kucakumbhayuge 'ṅgulīyam /
S01kbavk64u:631: sā kāntam āgatam avetya kutas tvayedaṃ
S01kbavk64u:633: KAvk_64.291 tatas tām avadad dāsī devi puṣkariṇītaṭe /
S01kbavk64u:634: sthitaḥ ko 'pi yuvā kāntaḥ pratyakṣa iva manmathaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:637: KAvk_64.293 iti tadvacanaṃ tanvī priyaṃ śrutvā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:638: niścitya dayitaṃ prāptam ānināya tayaiva tam //
S01kbavk64u:639: KAvk_64.294 tayā guptatare nyastaṃ kāntam udyānamandire /
S01kbavk64u:642: tayoḥ praharṣānubhavena lebhe śobhām aśeṣāṅgavatīm anaṅgaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:643: yad yat kiṃ cid virahasamaye cintayābhyastam antar
S01kbavk64u:645: yad yat premṇaḥ sadṛśam ucitaṃ yad yad autsukyarāśes
S01kbavk64u:646: tat tat sarvaṃ praṇayasubhagaṃ dampatī cakratus tau //
S01kbavk64u:651: KAvk_64.299 aho pramādapatitā daivād anucite jane /
S01kbavk64u:654: bata prayātam etat te martyasnehena śocyatāṃ //
S01kbavk64u:658: malinā khalavidyeva saṃmatāsi na kasya cit //
S01kbavk64u:659: KAvk_64.303 rūpamātreṇa tuṣṭā tvaṃ yadi martyavaśaṃ gatā /
S01kbavk64u:663: KAvk_64.305 vadhyo me tvatpatiḥ pāpe hīnasaṃbandhalajjayā /
S01kbavk64u:667: KAvk_64.307 iti sā bhartsitā pitrā tam uvāca natānanā /
S01kbavk64u:669: KAvk_64.308 kopād anucitaṃ tāta naitan māṃ vaktum arhasi /
S01kbavk64u:670: na śrūyante prabhāveṇa kiṃ narāḥ kinnarādhikāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:671: KAvk_64.309 garuḍasyāpi durlaṅghyām imām ullaṅghya yaḥ kṣitim /
S01kbavk64u:672: prabhāvabhūmir āyāti manuṣyaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet //
S01kbavk64u:673: KAvk_64.310 guṇasaṃvādinī mūrtir bhavaty eva śaririṇām /
S01kbavk64u:674: karoty ānanda saṃvādaṃ dyutir eva himatviṣaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:675: KAvk_64.311 jātyā kiṃ kriyate tāta svabhāvānuguṇā guṇāḥ /
S01kbavk64u:677: KAvk_64.312 bhavanty antarguṇāḥ ke cic channadoṣās tathāpare /
S01kbavk64u:679: KAvk_64.313 śrutvaitat kinnarapatis tat tatheti vicintya ca /
S01kbavk64u:681: KAvk_64.314 tvayā kāntyā jitās tāvad ete kinnaradārakāḥ /
S01kbavk64u:684: vyuptam anyūnam uccitya punar dehi tilādhakam //
S01kbavk64u:687: KAvk_64.317 ity aśakye 'pi kauṭilyāt preritas tena karmaṇi /
S01kbavk64u:693: KAvk_64.320 asyāsmin samayāyāse kāryaṃ sāhāyyakaṃ mayā /
S01kbavk64u:704: punas tadvañcanāyaiva tāṃ tāṃ yuktim acintayat //
S01kbavk64u:707: KAvk_64.327 sa tam ūce prabhāvo 'yaṃ divyaḥ prakaṭitas tvayā /
S01kbavk64u:711: KAvk_64.329 ity uktas tena sa punaḥ kinnarīśatapañcakam /
S01kbavk64u:713: KAvk_64.330 tāsāṃ madhye parijñāya sa jagrāha manoharām /
S01kbavk64u:715: KAvk_64.331 devo 'yam iti niścitya tatas taṃ kinnareśvaraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:716: tuṣṭas tasmai dadau divyaratnaiḥ saha manoharām //
S01kbavk64u:718: jāyāsakhas tam āmantrya kumāraḥ svapuraṃ yayau //
S01kbavk64u:719: KAvk_64.333 manoharāgragaṃ putraṃ prāptam ālokya bhūpatiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:721: KAvk_64.334 putraṃ tataś caritacandrasitātapatre rājye 'bhiṣicya paritāpaharaṃ prajānāṃ /
S01kbavk64u:723: KAvk_64.335 putraṃ tataś caritacandrasitātapatre rājye 'bhiṣicya paritāpaharaṃ prajānāṃ /
S01kbavk64u:725: prāptābhiṣekaṃ sudhanam prabhāte taṃ saptaratnāni pṛthupratāpam /
S01kbavk64u:727: KAvk_64.336 sa bodhisattvaḥ sudhano 'ham eva yaśodharā sāpi manoharābhūt
S01kbavk64u:732: KAvk_64.338 iti bhikṣugaṇaḥ svayaṃ jinena svakathāṃ tāṃ viniveditāṃ niśamya /
S01kbavk64u:733: sarasaṃ pṛthumūlam eva mene śataśākhasya manobhavam bhavasya //
S01kbavk64u:734: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sudhanakinnaryavadānaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭitamaḥ pallavaḥ
